metadata.title: Canada- MEDS World Archive for Drifting Buoy Data (DRIBU)
metadata.description:
Parameter
surface currents from drifting buoys, SST, air pressure

Measurement Details
buoy positions and data via Service ARGOS (satellite tracking)

PSARC_Utility
Probably of little direct use in stock assessment.  Drifter data may be useful in validating circulation models and in detecting/demonstrating anomalies in the circulation of the North Pacific.

Improvements
"Improve access to these data.  Investigate status of software ""tools"" to extract subsets and summaries."

Base Internet/URL
http://www.meds.dfo.ca

A TCODE project
